extendedInfo.description: !! THIS IS THE NEW VERSION !!Lost an important file and google would not let me update older version. Please re-install with this version, and delete your old version!Ministry School Timer is an application for timing the Theocratic  Ministry School for Jehovah's Witnesses at their congregation meetings. It has the ability for the School timer to time Bible Highlights, Bible Reading, Number 2, and Number 3 Parts.Suggestions? Leave them here

reviews.title: Prefect
reviews.comment: Great for keeping track of talk times, love the ability to email myself the time at end of meeting. Assits the young brother who records time for me, he loves it too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Works great, now only needs update to support Galaxy Note screen size.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s a good app and I appreciate the idea behind it, but the bell feature, while humorous, isn\'t the way we\'re supposed to do things anymore. But otherwise a very good app! :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thank You! GS2Skyrocket
reviews.comment: This apps perfect for us brothers who need to learn to keep our parts well timed. I use it every week so I can learn from all the others. Thank you & keep up the good work! 10 *\'s!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: RAZR MAXX HD
reviews.comment: Love the app! Can you please make the icon on the highlights page larger? It\'s tough to hit the little x to reset the timer. Maybe have a reset icon.
reviews.author: Leon Davis

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: This didn\'t work on my Galaxy Nexus (Verizon) until I rooted and put Jelly Bean on my phone. Now works great. I especially like how it times individual comments for the Bible Highlights. Excellent interface!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: Now if I can just keep my talks within the proper time limit. Got an app for that? ;-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy to use and very helpful
reviews.comment: Thanks for this app, the reports are very helpful to keep track. Wish that comments time could be included in report rather than or with the average.
reviews.author: Steven Campos

reviews.title: ER@StL
reviews.comment: This app has been very useful to me. I have switched to Windows Phone 7. Could you make this app for that platform, please?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tablet view?
reviews.comment: Can this be updated so it looks good on a tablet? Please advise.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Brilliant app. Well done brother. One prob, my reports are dated incorrectly-any idea why?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tablet version?
reviews.comment: App works great on my razor but buttons are off the screen on tablet. Also can\'t resize the screen to make it fit on tablet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Loved this app. But it has quit working.  Resets timer halfway through assignments. Did it to me last week during CO visit. Not good. Please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gr8
reviews.comment: Very useful! Xcellent!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very good and simple.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Has never failed on our Nexus One or Nexus S
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent Tool
reviews.comment: GREAT APP! Does everything I need it too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not bad. Will keep using physical timer but good to have this as a backup.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: For some reason when I generate the report, the date is always one month behind.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Good help for min. School
reviews.author: Moi Cruz
